name: AffiliateTraction Canada
tag_list: affiliate-marketing-program, affiliate-management, affiliate-agency, outsourced-affiliate-management, affiliate-marketing-services, canadian-affiliate-agency, affiliate-marketing-firm, affiliate-marketing-expert, affiliate-manager, outsourced-program-mana
overview: AffiliateTraction, with offices in Ontario, is the largest affiliate program marketing company that provides affiliate management services for top online retailers in Canada. For over 10 years Affiliate Traction has been working to develop the perfect affiliate marketing system. AffiliateTraction Canada is not an outsourced program manager or an affiliate network, but rather a multifaceted and comprehensive service designed to proactively implement, manage, and grow your affiliate program.

milestones.description: AffiliateTraction Canada, the largest Canadian affiliate program management firm, has partnered with AvantLink.com for the launch of AvantLink.ca, the first exclusively Canadian affiliate marketing network.
milestones.source_description: AffiliateTraction Canada & AvantLink.com Partner for AvantLink.ca Launch

milestones.description: First Exclusively Canadian Affiliate Network Features Programs Managed By AffiliateTraction Canada
milestones.source_description: AffiliateTraction Canada & AvantLink.com Partner for AvantLink.ca Launch
